ComputerVision::BlobFinder

ComputerVision::BlobFinder Class Reference

List of all members.

Detailed Description

For internal use only.

Class that analyzes an image to finds blobs (elements). What it looks for in an image is bright areas, so typically the image result of a background subtraction is a good input. It also gives information about the found blobs.


Public Types

typedef std::vector< Blob > Blobs
 Contains a sequence of blobs.
